mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_sig_log_all( operateid, userorg, mainaccount, subaccount, subtype, subifsensitive, sysid, visitway, serverip, clientip, opername, ifsensitive, fuzzify, batchoper, senid, involvephone, opertypenum, operdate, operdescribe, servertypenum, goldbank, goldbankid, ifauth, authtype, userauthid, endopertime, op_time) VALUES ( #{operateId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userOrg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subIfSensitive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitWay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifsensitive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuzzify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchOper, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvePhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTypeNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operDescribe, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverTypeNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goldbank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goldbankId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifAuth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userauthId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endOperTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op_time ,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO st_sig_log_report_dm( logdate, operateid, subaccount, subtype, subifsensitive, sysid, visitway, serverip, clientip, opername, ifsensitive, fuzzify, batchoper, senid, involvephone, opertypenum, operdate, servertypenum, goldbank, goldbankid, ifauth, authtype, userauthid, service_port) VALUES ( #{logDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subIfSensitive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitWay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifsensitive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuzzify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchOper, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{involvePhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTypeNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverTypeNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goldbank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goldbankId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifAuth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userauthId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{server_port, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
